item.description:
Karla suggested this meetup location and it seems lots of people like the idea! So, we'll have our August meetup at McDonald Park in Medford.

This large park has lots of open grassy areas, paved paths, and one side of it is the shore of the Mystic River (good for swimming or wading if a dog needs to cool off on a hot day). It's a lovely place to walk along the paths on a leash, or to run and chase birds and even an occasional rabbit. The parking lot is on Rte 16, near Wellington Circle, Medford.

I am starting the meetup at 9:30 am, hoping to beat the heat! If anyone wants to start earlier, please post a time in the comment of your RSVP. If a majority agrees, I will modify the time.

Hope to see you there!
Laura & Molly,
Karla & Rufus
item.how_to_find_us: We are meeting at theTorbert McDonald Park.

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel August Meetup
